page.title: 06LEISURE IN ERSKINE
page.content: People in Erskine take part in a variety of leisure activities. There is a mixture of indoor and outdoor sports, active and spectator sports mentioned by people as being their favourite leisure activity. Some residents are keen gardeners. There are numerous football teams to be joined and netball is available for girls. Erskine is close to the Old Kilpatrick Hills which makes it ideal for hillwalking. Cycling is another popular pastime with adults and children. Some of the people also said that they enjoyed a game of golf. Ladies can join one of the many keep fit classes in the area. People also enjoy playing bingo and watching television.
